snippet: Military officials said Friday that an airstrike hit a vehicle carrying passengers suspected of being militants who were traveling in eastern Yemen, killing eight.
abstract: American drone reportedly kills eight suspected militants in Yemen.
lead_paragraph: Military officials said Friday that an airstrike hit a vehicle carrying passengers suspected of being militants who were traveling in eastern Yemen, killing eight.

headline.seo: Drone Kills Suspected Militants in Yemen, Officials Say
headline.main: Yemen: Drone Kills Suspected Militants, Officials Say
headline.print_headline: Yemen: Drone Kills Suspected Militants, Officials Say
